product_name: Icebreaker Sonic Long-Sleeve Half-Zip Top - Men's
long_description: The men's Icebreaker Sonic Long-Sleeve half-zip top uses merino wool to wick moisture and a zipper to let you ventilate when you're working out in cool weather. Lightweight merino wool and spandex jersey fabric offers high performance with light stretch, and its smooth surface enhances comfort. Fabric wicks moisture and dries quickly; merino wool resists odors naturally. With a UPF 50+ rating, fabric provides excellent protection against harmful ultraviolet rays. Mesh underarm and back panels ventilate to enhance comfort. Back stash pocket at hem stores small items. Long-length sleeves with thumbholes warm wrists during cold weather. Reflective logo. Machine washable. The Icebreaker Sonic Half-Zip top offers a slim fit with a droptail hem.
short_description: The men's Icebreaker Sonic Long-Sleeve half-zip top uses merino wool to wick moisture and a zipper to let you ventilate when you're working out in cool weather.
